ItemWeapon.name: discourager
ItemWeapon.description: A small machinepistol capable of truly phenomenal rates of fire. It's a 'little' hard to control but if unleashing this on someone won't discourage them from trying to make a meal of you probably nothing will. (fires 12 round burst, each shot that hits does 1-6 damage)

missText.text: you hit TARGET with your gunfire

hitText.text: you hose down TARGET with gunfire for VALUE kinetic damage
